abstract: Sharon Block, the deputy assistant for Congressional affairs at the Labor Department, and Richard Griffin, general counsel for the International Union of Operating Engineers, were tapped to fill vacancies.
snippet: Sharon Block, the deputy assistant for Congressional affairs at the Labor Department, and Richard Griffin, general counsel for the International Union of Operating Engineers, were tapped to fill vacancies.
lead_paragraph: President Obama is nominating two new members to the National Labor Relations Board a week after the panel withdrew its case against Boeing over building an airplane factory in South Carolina.

headline.main: Obama Names Two to Serve on Labor Board
headline.print_headline: Obama Names Two to Serve on Labor Board
